title: Computational Node
description: Computational Node schema describes attributes related to computational nodes.

nodeType.description: The type of node (IoT object, Switch, Server).

deployedContainers.description: a reference to the identification of the deployed container in this computational node [reference to the container schema in Edge-Cloud Continuum Model]

deployedPods.description: a reference to the identification of the deployed Pods in this computational node [reference to the  schema Pod Json Edge-Cloud Continuum Model]

roomId.description: The identifier of the bay hosting the node (in the case of a server), null in the case if the computational node is IoT object.

rackNumber.description: The rack number on which the node is plugged in a rack[reference to the rack json schema]

longitude.description: The current longitude where the node is located.

latitude.description: The current latitude where the node is located.

geometryMatrix.description: A 3 x 2 matrix defining the relative coordinates of a 480 mm unit representing the box of the object in a 3-dimensional space. This allows positioning and visualizing assets in space.

physicalDependencies.description: List of nodes with which the node has dependencies.

services.description: List of services located at the node level.

ramCapacity.description: The Random Access Memory (RAM) capacity of the node.

diskCapacity.description: The storage capacity (hard disk) of the node.

networkInterfaces.description: The number of network interfaces of the node.

networkBandwidth.description: The network bandwidth of the node.

cpuCores.description: The number of processor cores of the node.

cpuModel.description: The model of the node's processor.

cpuFrequency.description: The frequency of the node's processor.

gpuModel.description: The model of the node's Graphics Processing Unit (GPU).

gpuFrequency.description: The frequency of the node's Graphics Processing Unit (GPU).

operatingSystem.description: The operating system installed on the node.

powerCapacity.description: The power capacity of the node.

intensityCapacity.description: The intensity capacity of the node.

entryDateTime.description: The date and time when the asset entered the datacenter.

removalDateTime.description: The date and time when the asset is scheduled to be removed from the datacenter.

vendor.description: The vendor or manufacturer of the node.

cpuUsageData.description: Real-time data of CPU usage of the node.

ramUsageData.description: Real-time data of RAM usage of the node.

diskIO.description: Real-time data of disk Input/Output operations of the file system or volumes attached to the nodes.

networkBandwidthUsage.description: The amount of data transferred via the node's network interfaces.

energyConsumption.description: The electrical consumption of the node.

batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the node.

CO2Footprint.description: The amount of CO2 emitted by the node.
